definition: to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: This paper describes the basic principles of the image digitizer and its development course.
sentences.chinese: 本文论述了图像数字化器的基本原理及其发展过程。

sentences.english: Occurs on a pen thread when the cursor leaves the bounds of an element.
sentences.chinese: 当用户将触笔从数字化仪上提起时，在笔线程上发生。

sentences.english: Our school has established Wei Nier digital lab in 2005.
sentences.chinese: 我校在2005年建立了威尼尔数字化实验室。

sentences.english: They have been one of the last digital hold outs.
sentences.chinese: 他们曾是为数不多的未被数字化的东西之一。

sentences.english: If you can digitize books, go for it.
sentences.chinese: 如果你能把这些书籍数字化，那么可以。

sentences.english: Fully digital line switching and MCU controlled service reset timing.
sentences.chinese: 全数字化线路开关和单片机控制服务复位时间。

sentences.english: The standard radiograph which is used for teaching can be stored and managed in the form of digital image by the system.
sentences.chinese: 该系统能对标准教学片进行数字化存贮和管理。

sentences.english: Cleaning machine and merging machine are controled by Digital .
sentences.chinese: 数字化控制清洗机和合片机。

sentences.english: Digital operation panel, All control instruction are to be executed completely by CPU.
sentences.chinese: 全数字化操作面板，所有控制指令由CPU执行完成。

sentences.english: The development procedure of the digital design of typical oilfield equipment is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了典型石油设备的数字化设计的开发程序。

sentences.english: The anti-skid braking controller of a aircraft was reconstructed in a digital way.
sentences.chinese: 本文针对某型飞机的防滑刹车系统进行了数字化改造。

sentences.english: Research on error analysis of machining of digital tooth surfaces.
sentences.chinese: 数字化齿面展成加工齿廓误差综合性分析。

sentences.english: It realized digital of nondestructive testing for spiral welded pipe.
sentences.chinese: 实现了螺旋焊管无损检测的数字化。

sentences.english: The interconnection of the monitoring system of large irrigating area is a physical platform of digital irrigating area.
sentences.chinese: 大型灌区监控系统互联是数字化灌区的物理平台。

sentences.english: Digitised commodity money may then be in store for us.
sentences.chinese: 届时，我们或许可以采用数字化“商品货币”。

sentences.english: It is the first attempt in China to set up a digital seismic network for microquake.
sentences.chinese: 数字化微震台网在国内是第一次尝试。

definition: informatization (the Information Age analog of industrialization)
